job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you passionate about leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to drive innovation and create impactful solutions? Join our dynamic software company as we expand our team to explore new frontiers in AI technology. We're seeking a talented AI Engineer to collaborate with us on customer projects, lead face-to-face workshops, and contribute to the discovery of cutting-edge GenAI products from Google Cloud.

   Profile

   As an AI Engineer, you'll play a key role in driving AI initiatives within our organization. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
     * Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
     * Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects, ensuring high quality and efficiency.
     * Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform.
     * Working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into our products and services.
     * Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI-related projects and initiatives.
job_details.full_text:
Medior AI Engineer

Are you passionate about leveraging the power of artificial intelligence and machine learning to drive innovation and create impactful solutions? Join our dynamic software company as we expand our team to explore new frontiers in AI technology. We're seeking a talented AI Engineer to collaborate with us on customer projects, lead face-to-face workshops, and contribute to the discovery of cutting-edge GenAI products from Google Cloud.

   Profile

   As an AI Engineer, you'll play a key role in driving AI initiatives within our organization. Your responsibilities will include:
     * Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation.
     * Leading face-to-face workshops and training sessions to educate customers on AI technologies and best practices.
     * Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects, ensuring high quality and efficiency.
     * Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform.
     * Working closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into our products and services.
     * Providing technical expertise and guidance on AI-related projects and initiatives.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes collaboration with customers to understand their AI needs, focusing on Generative AI, leading workshops on AI technologies, developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs, and researching new GenAI products from Google Cloud. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities and typical projects of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in building and deploying AI solutions for customer projects and exploring generative models.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation' directly relates to understanding business context and translating needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with customers to understand their AI needs and requirements, assisting the customer to understanding the impact of Generative AI in their business, and making concrete and informed decisions on implementation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'making concrete and informed decisions on implementation' implies understanding business goals and constraints to guide technical decisions.
job_tasks.phrase: making concrete and informed decisions on implementation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects' indicates the creation and application of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing AI solutions and POCs tailored to customer projects

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform' suggests involvement in understanding and potentially adapting generative models.
job_tasks.phrase: Conducting research and exploration of new AI products and services offered by Google Cloud's GenAI platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integrate AI capabilities into our products and services' points to the software engineering aspect of embedding AI into applications.
job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI capabilities into our products and services

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'ensuring high quality and efficiency' in developing and implementing solutions implies a concern for production-readiness and operational aspects.
